question_content.description:
### Problem22

Traditionally, programmers use the term _____(0)\___ to refer to code that can be compiled and run independently; in Java, each _____(1)\___ is a module (literally from sec-2.2).

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Beilong Tang
